mng: to make a copy, to plagiarize, to search and seize, to raid, to grab, to go off with, to take a shortcut, to make a turning move, to fold one's arms

exm.mng: to plagiarize, to copy, to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to make a copy (and send it to someone), Cc (for email), Carbon Copy (for email)
to fold one's arms, copyist, (dialect) wonton
to take inventory of and confiscate a criminal's possessions
to search a house and confiscate possessions
